title: Owl's Nest
description: Top secret research facility used for strategic R&D projects in the TwilioQuest Program. Birthplace of Cedric and the CEV 'Fog Owl' prototype.
questDescription: Use WASD or arrow keys to move, spacebar to interact. Flip the blue switch!
defaultGoal: Take command of a prototype Cloud Exploration Vessel. Speak with TwilioQuest scientists for help and further information.

flavorTextOverrides.security_pylon:
These security pylons won't budge until I flip the blue switch on the left.

To interact with an object like the switch, I need to walk over to it and press the spacebar.
flavorTextOverrides.under_construction: This part of the base looks like it is still under construction.
